name: Drag and Drop File Upload for Contact Form 7
author: add-ons.org

sections.description:
DEMO: https://demo.add-ons.org/demo-drag-and-drop-fields/

Allows you to add powerful Drag & Drop or choose Multiple Files Uploading area to your Contact Form 7. You can provide your website visitors with a seamless and user-friendly file upload experience, allowing them to submit multiple files as part of your forms easily

Features

  • Easy to use
  • Image Preview: Show Thumbnail for images
  • File Type Validation
  • File Size Validation
  • Limit number of files Upload
  • Send files as email attachment or as a links
  • Support multiple languages
  • Mobile Responsive

Download Pro Version: https://add-ons.org/plugin/contact-form-7-drag-and-drop-files-upload//
Document: https://add-ons.org/document-contact-form-7-drag-and-drop-files-multiple-files/
sections.installation:
Normal installation

  1. Download the drag-and-drop-file-upload-for-elementor-forms.zip file to your computer.
  2. Unzip the file.
  3. Upload the drag-and-drop-file-upload-for-elementor-forms directory to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

  5. Document: https://add-ons.org/document-contact-form-7-drag-and-drop-files-multiple-files/Normal installation

  6. Download the *****.zip file to your computer.

  7. Unzip the file.
  8. Upload the *****. directory to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  9. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
